page.title: 10A day in the life of...
page.content: I get up in the morning and go downstairs .I wash my face and get dressed and have a dish of Rice Krispies.Then I brush my teeth and comb my hair and go to school in the car. I go to{Kirk Sandall First School.I play with my friends until the bell goes and then I take off my coat and line up and wait for the teacher.We work in the morning until 10.30 then we have playtime then we go back to work until lunch at 12.00.I stay at school for lunch_my favourite{school lunch}is{shepherd's pie_then we go back for afternoon school until 3.30.My hobbies are {dancing and}horse-riding.Sometimes we take the dog for a walk to the shop and then I go to my friend Sarah's house to play and sometimes we go to the park.
